subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_6067d0d3-da72-4de4-8be3-14cfe0902e31_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


It's an auto reversing tape deck, one that flips the heads when the tape r=
eaches the end, so you don't have to turn over the tape. You modify it so t=
he tape direction reverses, but the heads don't, so it plays backwards. The=
se are usually Walkman types, but not all can be modified.  I used old deck=
s forthe thrift store. You can alos get them from reversespeech.com
 
Frank=
-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec =
2007 21:15:44 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470=
... I hope




Hey Frank,Could you please elaborate on "reversing decks"? I=
 use Cool Edit Pro to import, analyze, and save my EVPs. It is capable of r=
eversals of the wave form, isn't it? And is it as simple as that?Thank You,=
Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrot=
e:>> > I have "reversing decks" and I do it on the computer with normal spe=
ech, and EVP. It's as real as anything else.> > Frank-s> > > To: EVP-ITC@..=
.: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 19:56:57 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Som=
e new additions for the 12-470... I hope> > > > > Kewl!Who knows... I'm not=
 totally convinced on Reverse Speech either. But then I suppose trying as m=
any different things as we are inspired to is a good thing.Lance--- In EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@> wrote:>> > Yes, but onl=
y when the intuition hits to reverse a voice, or phrase. I don't use it on =
everything, but there is often a reverse component. > > Frank-S> > > To: EV=
P-ITC@: orbhunterx@: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 06:02:39 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: S=
ome new additions for the 12-470... I hope> > > > > What about reverse spee=
ch?Has anyone considered trying to use this technique with voice recordings=
 from the boxes? Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <frank=
s-boxes@> wrote:>> > Well, I can tell where that theory came from! It's bee=
n my experience, they use what we use, as long as it's something they can f=
orm voices out of. It's also been my experience that the combo noise/frag v=
oice is what our own minds create. I suggest you play with EVPmaker, with c=
lear raw audio, you'll find no white noise needed. > > I don't get any ment=
ion of technicians, or anykind of helper/operators on the other side. They =
sometimes talk about a network, but I couldn't tell you what that is, or if=
 it's real. > > I think it's 99.99%PK. So not only do spirits, and other en=
tities make voices, we can do it to, mostly unconciuosly. > > Moon is still=
 certain that it has to be random, despite the last several months of exper=
iments that show the linear mode is far superior. > > If someone could take=
 a digital speech recordng, stored in memory, and chop it up, and play it b=
ack over a speaker, I think it would work just as well as radio. You could =
get live voices, answers to questions, and never replace the raw audio. Thi=
s is in fact EVPmaker, but it would be nice to have it portable. EVPmaker p=
retty much took all the mystery out of this, and it's all but igonred. My s=
ystem, and analog version of EVPmaker using technologies I had worked wiht =
in the past. My mind did kind of assemble all the elements, so I got an ima=
ge of the complete system. > > I thought I knew how the voices in my boxes =
worked at one time..now I have no idea!> > Frank-S> > > > > To: EVP-ITC@: m=
ichaelcoletta@: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 00:22:35 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Some new a=
dditions for the 12-470... I hope> > > > > Excuse me if I mispell some thin=
gs in this post, I'm currently running the production board for a LIVE inte=
rnet radion program going on right now, and I'm doing 100 things at once!Ok=
ay... According to some, "...the Spirit Technicians and Spirit Guides on th=
e other side have repeatedly explained that the way that the Telephone to t=
he Dead technology works, is by spirit energy manipulating the random volta=
ge generator (RVG) and using white and pink noise, as well as radio fragmen=
t, to create real time voice answers to questions posed from our side. The =
most important aspect to this device is the medium operator who works as an=
 antenna or "interpreter" for living individuals asking the questions."So, =
that said (or copied and pasted) I have decided that my next attempt with t=
he older version of the 12-470 will be the following:1) Add a method of var=
iable voltage used to adjust the tuning circuit, similar to the RVG mention=
ed above. I went out and purchased another older 12-470 today, to do just t=
his.(Frank... I did some measurements of that VT and found a range to work =
with.. I hope!)2) Add that white or pink noise to be mixed with the sweepin=
g raw audio already available from the modified 12-470.3) Add an internal a=
ntenna for the 12-470.4) Add an interface so the user will be a active/pass=
ive part of the radio. As mentioned above, as the antenna between the entit=
ies/spirits.So... if I can accomplish all that... maybe the little ole' 12-=
470 will be recognized by the "experts", as having what the big mahcines no=
w have... :-)Wish me luck in my adventure... and oh, by-the-way... I hope t=
o add all this, inside the existing case.- Mike > > > > > > > _____________=
_____________________________________________> You keep typing, we keep giv=
ing. Download Messenger and join the i'm Initiative now.> http://im.live.co=
m/messenger/im/home/?source=3DTAGLM> > > > > > > > ________________________=
__________________________________> You keep typing, we keep giving. Downlo=
ad Messenger and join the i'm Initiative now.> http://im.live.com/messenger=
/im/home/?source=3DTAGLM> > > > > > > > ___________________________________=
_______________________> Share life as it happens with the new Windows Live=
.Download today it's FREE!> http://www.windowslive.com/share.html?ocid=3DTX=
T_TAGLM_Wave2_sharelife_112007>

senger and join the i=92m Initiative now.

ome/?source=3DTAGLM

<BR>It's an auto reversing tape deck, one that flips the heads =
when the tape reaches the end, so you don't have to turn over the=
 tape. You modify it so the tape direction reverses, but the heads don't, s=
o it plays backwards. These are usually Walkman types, but not all can=
 be modified.  I used old decks forthe thrift store. You can alos=
 get them from reversespeech.com<BR>
 <BR>
Frank-S<BR><BR>
